main.name: Romeo Dixon
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React
main.bio: Hi there! I am Romeo! I'm Dynamic, results-driven Software Developer with over 2 years of exceptional expertise in website development and project management. Adept at responsive web design principles, cross-browser compatibility, user experience optimization, and various programming languages. A proven history of impeccable work ethic that adapts to a dynamic working environment, creates positive relationships, delivers productive results, and meets time-sensitive deadlines. Highly eager to invest in web development proficiencies in organizations seeking impactful transformations.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to be a part of the PAPA fam!

work.title: Front-End UI and UX Engineer II
work.description: Significantly improved application performance by using React and Redux to increase reusability and code quality. Thrived in an agile and high-paced environment to process design requirements, peer programs, and test applications. Maintained and debugged over 20-page applications by effectively collaborating with the UI/UX manager and team. Leveraged strong programming skills by refactoring legacy code to reusable code and libraries for future use. Developed an information-gathering wizard to optimize the addition of new departments in the app and increase user efficiency..

testimonials.text: Sonny is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Sonny has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
